named-query.name: UserData.getByEnabled
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserData u WHERE u.enabled = ?1

named-query.name: UserData.getByEnabled&EndDateOrderByStartDateDesc
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserData u WHERE u.enabled = ?1 AND u.dateCreated < ?2 ORDER BY u.dateCreated DESC

named-query.name: UserData.getByEnabled&EndDate&StartDate
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserData u WHERE u.enabled = ?1 AND u.dateCreated < ?2 AND u.dateCreated > ?3

named-query.name: UserData.getByEnabled&EndDate&StartDateOrderByStartDateDesc
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserData u WHERE u.enabled = ?1 AND u.dateCreated < ?2 AND u.dateCreated > ?3 ORDER BY u.dateCreated DESC

named-query.name: UserData.getByEnabled&Permissions.website
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserData u JOIN u.permissions p WHERE u.enabled = ?1 AND p.website = ?2

named-query.name: UserData.getByEnabled&UserNameOrEmailAddressStartsWith
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserData u WHERE u.enabled = ?1 AND (u.userName LIKE ?2 OR u.emailAddress LIKE ?2)

named-query.name: UserData.getByEndDateOrderByStartDateDesc
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserData u WHERE u.dateCreated < ?1 ORDER BY u.dateCreated DESC

named-query.name: UserData.getByUserName
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserData u WHERE u.userName= ?1

named-query.name: UserData.getByUserName&Enabled
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserData u WHERE u.userName= ?1 AND u.enabled = ?2

named-query.name: UserData.getByUserNameOrEmailAddressStartsWith
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserData u WHERE u.userName LIKE ?1 OR u.emailAddress LIKE ?1

named-query.name: UserData.getByUserNameOrderByUserName
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserData u WHERE u.userName= ?1 ORDER BY u.userName

named-query.name: UserData.getByPermissions.website
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserData u JOIN u.permissions p WHERE p.website = ?1

named-query.name: UserData.getByPermissions.website&Enabled&EndDate&StartDate
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserData u JOIN u.permissions p WHERE p.website = ?1 AND u.enabled = ?2 AND u.dateCreated < ?3 AND u.dateCreated > ?4

named-query.name: UserData.getByPermissions.website&EndDate&StartDate
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserData u JOIN u.permissions p WHERE p.website = ?1 AND u.dateCreated < ?2 AND u.dateCreated > ?3

named-query.name: UserData.getByEndDate&StartDateOrderByStartDateDesc
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserData u WHERE u.dateCreated < ?1 AND u.dateCreated > ?2 ORDER BY u.dateCreated DESC

named-query.name: UserData.getCountByUserNameLike
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(u) FROM UserData u WHERE UPPER(u.userName) LIKE ?1

named-query.name: UserData.getCountEnabledDistinct
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(u) FROM UserData u WHERE u.enabled = ?1
